info.name: Dead Space 2 Google
info.description:
Dark blue theme for Google in the style of Dead Space 2.

  • Includes Google+ style
  • All resolutions background

    • Sorry, style may be unavailable, because I have no money to maintain it. If you want to help bring back to life this style, you can make a donation using PayPal. I would be grateful for any help.
info.additionalInfo:
See also other my styles:

  "Dead Space 2 Yandex" theme: http://userstyles.org/styles/94769/dead-space-2-yandex

  "Dead Space 2 UserStyles" theme: http://userstyles.org/styles/95165/dead-space-2-userstyles


October 12, 2013: Added new holographic keyboard (see screenshot).
October 13, 2013: Keyboard updated (screenshot "keyboard close-up 2").
November 2, 2013: Log In form updated (screenshots: http://i925.photobucket.com/albums/ad96/Hatrage/Google_zpsca363459.png~original , http://i925.photobucket.com/albums/ad96/Hatrage/login_zps5ce87b1a.png~original ).
